Model.User

Class Issuer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.User.User
      • Model.User.Issuer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Developer

    public class Issuer
extends User
    Class extending the User class, representing an Issuer user object. An issuer is a user that can publish new bug reports.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Issuer(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String middleName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String userName)
      Default constructor for an issuer.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class Model.User.User

        getFirstName, getLastName, getMailbox, getMiddleName, getUserName, isValidUserName, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Issuer

        Issuer(java.lang.String firstName,
       java.lang.String middleName,
       java.lang.String lastName,
       java.lang.String userName)
throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Default constructor for an issuer.
        Parameters:
        firstName - The first name of the user.
        middleName - The middle name of the user.
        lastName - The last name of the user.
        userName - The user name of the user.
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - Username is empty.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - One of the name arguments is null. (use empty string instead)
